goals.description: Implement @jwt operator for JWT token generation, validation, and manipulation
goals.success_criteria: JWT tokens can be created, verified, decoded, and refreshed with proper error handling

goals.description: Implement @oauth operator for OAuth 2.0 authentication flows
goals.success_criteria: OAuth flows (authorization_code, client_credentials, password) work with proper token management

goals.description: Implement @vault operator for secrets management and secure storage
goals.success_criteria: Secrets can be stored, retrieved, rotated, and managed with encryption
